title: DayLight Watch Face HD
summary: An innovative watch face that changes image based on the time of the day.
description: This original watch face features more than 30 colorful images, based on natural landscapes in differents moments of the day. descriptionHTML:
This original watch face features more than 30 colorful images, based on natural landscapes in differents moments of the day. Every image will appear in a precise time of the day and will change automatically, depending on the real time.

Features:
✔ 30+ HD Images
✔ Time
✔ Day of the week
✔ Month
✔ Day of the month
✔ HD Images
🔋 Battery Friendly


-- Compatible with every Android Wear Smartwatch --


*After installing the watch face, it will auto-install on the smartwatch paired with the device (it can take a few minutes).


Download our others watch faces!
comments: I really love this watchface, but I really, really miss having a 24-hour clock. Could you please add a customization option for a 24 hour clock?
